subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Anybody here familiar with "Imaginary Landscape #4" by John Cage? I 
believe he gave 24 men 12 radios and had one man control the volume knob 
and another control the tuning knob on each radio. He recorded several 
minutes of it and issued it as a record.

BTW John Cage was one of the fathers of the avante-garde school of music.
I never noticed any EVP in the recording unfortunately.
:-)

Zack
